Articles.Content: Where are the flags how do I get them on my ship are they parts in the VAB?? please help me!

They are in game data/Squad/Flags, you can't apply them to ships yet, but after you choose one it appears on the flag pole at KSC, and if you right-click on a Kerbal while he is EVA on a world, there is the option to have him stick one where he is standing.
Oh thanks ! Now I can design my lander!
